Name: Age of Exploration
Scoring: The player with the most spaces containing their Acolytes (regardless of control) gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Patience
Scoring: Any player who has 6 cards in their hand at the end of this Age gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Survival
Scoring: The player with the most Acolytes in play gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Paradox
Scoring: Any player who does not Harvest any spaces at the end of this Age gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Beasts
Scoring: If you control both face-up Beast lairs, gain 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Dominion
Scoring: The player with the most spaces controlled gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Diplomacy
Scoring: The player with the most Acolytes on spaces that they do not control gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Prosperity
Setup: Gather 12 Gold cubes from the bank. Divide them evenly among the players. Beginning with the player with the Mantle, take turns placing 1 Gold cube on any space on the board.
Scoring: The player with the most Gold cubes in play gains 10 Gold.

Name: Age of Connection
Scoring: The player with the most spaces connected to their Colossus via Acolyte roads gains 10 Gold.
